title: Question about useing league on youtube
body: I'm making a YouTube Chanel and i would like to have some league videos but wondering if there is any copyright stuff i need to sort out first

replies.body: You're more than free to use your gameplay videos in your YouTube videos. For more information about what you can and can't do, check out the [**Legal Jibber Jabber**](http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber) page.

The tl;dr is basically, don't use the Riot logo or the LoL logo without permission, but everything else is completely free to use, even on monetised videos with the condition that the content is free to access (no youtube red for example, or paywalls of any kind).

So long as the content you create is free to access by the community you are free to use any game assets/lore/art etc that you want to.

(I'm a creator myself and went through all this many months ago :) Good luck with your videos!)
